faq.title: Questions about Investing in Brazil?
faq.subtitle: Answers to the main questions from international investors

items.question: Can foreign investors buy property in Brazil?
items.answer: Yes! Foreign investors can buy property in Brazil without restrictions, except in border areas and rural zones that require Congressional approval. I assist with the entire legal process and documentation required for international investors.

items.question: What documents are required for international investors?
items.answer: You will need a valid passport, Brazilian CPF (tax document), proof of address, and sworn translated documents. I help with obtaining the CPF and all necessary documentation, making the process simple and fast.

items.question: How does payment work for overseas investors?
items.answer: Payments can be made via international wire transfer, through a Brazilian account, or via foreign exchange contracts. I work with banking institutions specialized in international operations to ensure security and the best exchange rates.

items.question: Can I get a mortgage as a foreigner?
items.answer: Yes, foreign residents in Brazil can obtain financing. For non-residents, payment is usually in cash, but there are alternatives for direct installment plans with developers. I present the best options according to your profile.

items.question: What is the average return on investment in Balneário Camboriú?
items.answer: The region shows average appreciation of 8-15% per year and rental yield of 0.5-1% per month. Balneário Camboriú is known as the 'Brazilian Dubai' due to accelerated growth and high-standard developments. I provide detailed ROI analysis for each opportunity.

items.question: How does taxation work for foreign investors?
items.answer: Foreign investors pay the same taxes as Brazilians: ITBI on purchase (2-3%), annual IPTU (varies by municipality), and capital gains tax on sale (15-22.5%). I work with accountants specialized in international taxation.

items.question: Do you offer support in other languages?
items.answer: Yes! I provide service in Portuguese, English, and Spanish. All communication and documentation can be conducted in your preferred language to ensure complete understanding of the process.

items.question: Can I manage my investment remotely?
items.answer: Absolutely! I offer complete remote management service, including rental administration, maintenance, construction monitoring, and periodic reports. You invest with peace of mind from anywhere in the world.
